jd_information.description: We have urgent requirement for the post  Ticketing executiveCandidate must have minimum 1-3 years of experience in travel company & must have knowledge of Galileo and Amadeus software preferredSunday fixed OffQualification- undergraduate & graduateLocation-Lajpat Nagar-1Salary-as per your last salary neogitableMale & Female both can apply Walk-in- lajpat Nagar metro station, exit gate no-1 near metro pillar no-3 above westerned xclusive B-108 2nd floor JJ India. Contact person- Surjit(HR) 7011232824
